about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • M14/41 (47/40) tank (Rank 2 Italy);

  • Re.2001 Gruppo 22 fighter (Rank 2 Italy);

  • 120000 Silver Lions;

  • Premium Account for 7 days.

M14/41 (47/40)

The M14/41 was a modernization of the standard M13/40 and saw universal upgrades across the board, featuring improved armor, mobility, and firepower.

Chiefly, it features an improved 160 hp diesel engine which enhances its maneuverability nicely. It’s also equipped with a reinforced driver's hatch and fitted with an improved 47 mm cannon with a fast reload rate. Unique to this variant, a 13.2 mm Breda machine gun is placed in the hull with 25mm of penetration at 100 meters, allowing you to take down lightly armored vehicles with ease.

Re.2001 Gruppo 22

The Re.2001 is an upgraded variant of the Re.2000, complete with the more powerful Alfa Romeo R.A.1000 RC.41 engine.

As a fighter, it boasts impressive attributes with a strong climb and an even stronger turn rate. The Re.2001 could be regarded as something of an Italian Spitfire. It’s equipped with two 12.7 mm and two 7.7 mm machine guns in the nose and wings respectively. The 12.7 mm guns feature powerful HEF rounds in certain belts, allowing you to tear aircraft out of the sky with a good burst.

All premium vehicles allow you to earn increased Research Points and Silver Lions for each battle and comes furnished with all available modifications.

With a Premium account (also purchasable in the game for Golden Eagles) you will earn more Research Points and Silver Lions during each battle for a set amount of days. This is cumulative with bonuses from premium vehicles!

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • M14/41 (47/40) tank (Rank 2 Italy);

  • Re.2001 Gruppo 22 fighter (Rank 2 Italy);

  • 120000 Silver Lions;

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 660 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months; the minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD (Radeon RX 560) with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina v.10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 5200 (Mac), or analog from AMD/Nvidia for Mac. Minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p with Metal support
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Big Sur v. 10.16 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega II or higher with Metal support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

name: War Thunder - Italian Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4GB (Windows Vista/7/8/10)
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 level video card: AMD Radeon 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660. The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 level video card or higher and drivers: Nvidia GeForce 1060 and higher, Radeon RX 570 and higher
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: The premium M14/41 (47/40) light tank, the Re.2001 fighter, 7 days of Premium account and Silver Lions - a starter pack for legionnaires in War Thunder!
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Czech*, Turkish*, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
